data.text:
@MartijnB_81 @1NewsNZ lmao when has anecdotal evidence ever been a form of evidence. "i have a headache and im depressed.. i have covid so its definitely the 100% real LONG COVID!"

Nice one brainlet, literally nothing to back up your claim still.

@FartNPoopKing69 @1NewsNZ So eye witness reports can be dismissed because they don't meet your criteria? I wonder how you would feel if you struggled to walk to the dairy because you have continuous cluster migraines. You have no idea what you are talking about punk

@MartijnB_81 @1NewsNZ How am i denying reality, you have not backed up your claim. All you have proven so far is that people you know have self diagnosed themselves, LOL! "Long covid is a serious condition" haha yeah i bet it is brainlet.
@FartNPoopKing69 @1NewsNZ My point is that you're denying reality. Long Covid is a serious condition
@MartijnB_81 @1NewsNZ So a doctor self diagnosed themselves? Lol, whats your point?
@1NewsNZ More scared mongering, no worse than a hard night on the piss.
@SelenaBeecroft @1NewsNZ I fully believe you, please take care of yourself <3
@FartNPoopKing69 @1NewsNZ One of them IS a doctor.
